title: Help! Cant Click!
body: Hello, so first of all cant click with my mouse on summoner spells or any items... tryed to delete file **"PersistedSettings.json"**  and **"input.ini"** Dint worked... I think its bec of mine  acc, in others accounts it was all working, cant figure out whats the problem.

replies.body:
Because of how your inputs are saved, you'll need to reset them in a specific fashion. First, you'll want to **log into the game** and then hop into **a custom game**. *Alt+Tab* out of the match, then navigate to your config folder, which should be in your install directory:

**C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\Config**

Delete these two files:
**- input.ini
- PersistedSettings.json**

After completing those steps, leave the match and relog. You can then hop into another custom match with bots and make the changes you want. The settings should be default already, but if not you can hit the 'set to default button' and that should be it!
